knimeNode.name: GATKPhaseByTransmission
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the most likely genotype combination and phases trios and parent/child pairs.

fullDescription.intro: PhaseByTransmission is a GATK tool that 1) computes the most likely genotype combination and phases trios and parent/child pairs given their genotype likelihoods and a mutation prior and 2) phases all sites were parent/child transmission can be inferred unambiguously. It reports the genotype combination (and hence phasing) probability. For further information, see the GATK online documentation of the PhaseByTransmission walker.
